title: Holistic Health Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture clinic serving Ashland, Medford, Talent, Phoenix, Jacksonville, Central Point specializing in fertility, pain, stress, and women's health issues. Offered by Jenn Collins, L.Ac. and Jenny Riegg, L.Ac.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine We specialize in the treatment of illness, pain, stress, injury, fertility and women's health. Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine in Ashland, Medford, Rogue Valley, and Beyond Chinese Medicine is the oldest recorded health care system and provides time-tested protocols. At Holistic Health we use Chinese herbal formulas, acupuncture, and nutrition to improve the circulation of energy, blood, and nutrients throughout the body. We focus on the WHOLE person rather than treating individual symptoms. Our specialties include [acute illness](https://holistichealthacupuncture.com/acupuncture-treatments/#fertility) currently offer [telehealth herbal consultations](https://holistichealthacupuncture.com/telehealth/). We provide herbal support for acute illness, colds, flus, infections, fertility regulation, digestive support, and more. Please call at the first sign of symptoms for optimal results. Our acupuncturists use every resource available to create a treatment plan to fit your needs. Clients can choose from two beautiful clinics located in [Medford, Oregon](https://holistichealthacupuncture.com/medford-holistic-health/) and [Ashland, Oregon](https://holistichealthacupuncture.com/ashland-holistic-health/). We can work remotely on video and phone calls with clients who are out of the area. We work closely with local practitioners in the area and referrals are standard in our practice. Conversely, many patients are referred to us from their general practitioner, OB/GYN, chiropractor, or orthopedists. Insurance accepted. We look forward to creating a wellness plan that takes care of your body and has lasting changes on your life and for your family.
